Articles.Content:
do you ever have that moment when you are placing a decoupler right below the command pod and the game decides that when you put the rest of the rocket back on that 6 way symmetry with thrust pointing into the rocket instead of up is all the rave in rocket construction these days?

if you do post them pictures here!
We already have a number of threads for posting pictures from the game, including the big one. Please add to one of those threads rather than starting more for the same sort of material.
